Posts.Content: kickingcancersbutt wrote: Anyone having liver resection for solitary liver mets? My oncologist has referred me to surgery for possible resection since I only have one small tumor. I have read all the sites and this seems to be the latest recommendation from all the medical journals Dx 11/20/2012, DCIS, Right, 1cm, Stage 0, Grade 2, ER+/PR+, HER2- Surgery 12/4/2012 Lumpectomy: Right; Lymph node removal: Sentinel Hormonal Therapy 1/1/2013 Arimidex (anastrozole) Radiation Therapy 2/1/2013 Breast Surgery 3/19/2015 Hormonal Therapy Faslodex (fulvestrant) Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: stage 4 with liver mets kickingcancersbutt kickingcancersbutt
